law.catch_line: By filing the written consent required under § 17-537(b)(6) of this subtitle, the nonresident real ...
law.text: By filing the written consent required under § 17-537(b)(6) of this subtitle, the nonresident real estate broker or nonresident real estate salesperson appoints the Executive Director of the Commission as agent to receive a subpoena, summons, or other process.
